System ClassÂ¶

Access with Robo Instance:

BLE_Name = "Robo1" -- example BLE name
my_robo = Robo(BLE_Name)
my_robo.System

play_sound(int sound_clip_index):

my_robo.play_sound(0)
sound_clip_index: 0-7
